column4: I can normaly view contents of iso files from nautalis,  you on a server or desktop?
oh ya you do need to be sudo to mount stuf sudo mount -o loop /home/sacarlson/ubuntu-10.04.4-alternate-i386.iso /mnt/ubuntu-cd
the directory must be created at that location before you can mount to it
gksudo nautilus;  but be carefull as you can do some bad things with this
